Explain fully the circumstances of a: These payments represent the reporting plan's reimbursement to the union for (i) its share of the cost of a telephone maintenance agreement, (ii) its computer expenses, and (iii) its postage meter charges incurred, during the plan year ended June 30, 2005. Sharing of such administrative costs between a plan and a labor union is specifically contemplated by Prohibited Transaction Exemption 77-10.
Ladies and Gentlemen: The transactions, dealings and interests that are detailed in the attached Form LM-10 represent our good faith effort to reconstruct the reportable occurrences for the Fund's fiscal year that began on July 1,2004 and ended on June 30, 2005. If, in the future, it comes to our attention that there exists a transaction, dealing, or interest that should have been reported for that fiscal year, we will immediately file an amended Form LM-10.
